thread.title: RG3 statue at Baylor vandalized with TCU colors
thread.title_full: RG3 statue at Baylor vandalized with TCU colors

title: RG3 statue at Baylor vandalized with TCU colors
text:
RG3 statue at Baylor vandalized with TCU colors WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- Photos of a vandalized statue of Robert Griffin III at Baylor University are circulating online. Post to Facebook RG3 statue at Baylor vandalized with TCU colors WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- Photos of a vandalized statue of Robert Griffin III at Baylor University are circulating online.  //on.wusa9.com/1LlBSQW   Join the Conversation To   RG3 statue at Baylor vandalized with TCU colors 9:25 a.m. EDT October 9, 2015 Aug 29, 2015; Baltimore, MD, USA; Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III (10) walks on to the field with his teammates before the game against the Baltimore Ravens at M&T Bank Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Tommy Gilligan-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Tommy Gilligan-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
WASHINGTON (WUSA9) -- Photos of a vandalized statue of Robert Griffin III at Baylor University are circulating online. 
Vandals apparently defaced the statue of Baylor’s Heisman Trophy winner -- and recently demoted Washington Redskins quarterback -- with purple spray paint. That color, of course, is the team color of rival Texas Christian University. 
The statue stands outside McLane Stadium. It's unclear why the statue was targeted at this time. 
WacoTrib.com reports that according to Baylor’s executive associate athletics director for external affairs the university's department of public safety was contacted about the vandalism. He said that video surveillance from that area will be reviewed soon. Read or Share this story: http://on.wusa9.com/1LlBSQW TOP VIDEOS
